---
title: LIONBRIDGE
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: lionbridge
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $14.7M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with LIONBRIDGE. The average
  contract duration was 0.97 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $172.8K.
  The longest contract was 7.07 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $5.3M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '14.7M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '481'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '124'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '26%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '118%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.81'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '14.5M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.97'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '172.8K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '7.07'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '5.3M'
---
